ids_info.name: edge_sources
ids_info.description: Edge plasma sources. Energy terms correspond to the full kinetic energy equation (i.e. the energy flux takes into account the energy transported by the particle flux)

edge_sources/midplane.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: edge_sources/midplane
IDS: edge_sources
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 2
PARENT_CONTAINER: edge_sources
FIELD_NAME: midplane
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: edge_sources -> midplane

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Choice of midplane definition (use the lowest index number if more than one value is relevant) 

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[edge_sources]: Edge plasma sources. Energy terms correspond to the full kinetic energy equation (i.e. the energy flux takes into account the energy transported by the particle flux)

edge_sources/source/species.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: edge_sources/source/species
IDS: edge_sources
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: edge_sources/source
FIELD_NAME: species
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: edge_sources -> source -> species

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Species causing this source term (if relevant, e.g. a particular ion or neutral state in case of line radiation)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[edge_sources]: Edge plasma sources. Energy terms correspond to the full kinetic energy equation (i.e. the energy flux takes into account the energy transported by the particle flux)
CONTAINER[edge_sources/source]: Set of source terms

edge_sources/source/species/type.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: edge_sources/source/species/type
IDS: edge_sources
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 3
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 4
PARENT_CONTAINER: edge_sources/source/species
FIELD_NAME: type
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: edge_sources -> source -> species -> type

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Species type. index=1 for electron; index=2 for ion species in a single/average state (refer to ion structure); index=3 for ion species in a particular state (refer to ion/state structure);  index=4 for neutral species in a single/average state (refer to neutral structure); index=5 for neutral species in a particular state (refer to neutral/state structure);  index=6 for neutron; index=7 for photon

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[edge_sources]: Edge plasma sources. Energy terms correspond to the full kinetic energy equation (i.e. the energy flux takes into account the energy transported by the particle flux)
CONTAINER[edge_sources/source]: Set of source terms
CONTAINER[edge_sources/source/species]: Species causing this source term (if relevant, e.g. a particular ion or neutral state in case of line radiation)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[edge_sources]: Edge plasma sources. Energy terms correspond to the full kinetic energy equation (i.e. the energy flux takes into account the energy transported by the particle flux)
CONTAINER[edge_sources/source]: Set of source terms
CONTAINER[edge_sources/source/species]: Species causing this source term (if relevant, e.g. a particular ion or neutral state in case of line radiation)
